ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This work was partially funded through the ECDC project OCS-2014-OUT-1830-JGLuMu. S.T. was partially funded by the German Research Platform for Zoonoses (FKZ: 01KI1601). The authors would like to thank Bertrand Sudre and Laura Espinosa for their support with Chikungunya data in the Caribbean.
